titleStmt.title: The hatefull hypocrisie, and rebellion of the Romishe prelacie. By Lewys Euans
titleStmt.author: Evans, Lewis, fl. 1574.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churchyarde, at the signe of the Lucrece, by Thomas Purfoote],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Quire B outer forme is in two settings, and the inner formes of D and E are in two impositions. B1r line 8 of text ends (1) "withe" or (2) "wyth"; D2r has catchword (1) "hoodde" or (2) "ma-".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
